title: Which is the best place to find old coins value? - Quora

response.answer_text: The best place is to work a job (like a cashier or the like) where you constantly handle coin, and can pick out the rare/old/special ones you find. Alternatively, you could become a “coin roll hunter”, wherein you buy rolls from the bank in a high volume, sort through them, return them, repeat. Although, this works better/worse in different countries.
